sub-events.comment: Allow WASD as alternate controls to arrow keys.
Mirror the player's image so they appear facing the right way when moving left or right.
Sheild Stun only less than 0.3 seconds
P1 is below PT send to PB above
P1 is above PT teleport to PB below if not overlapping ground
P1 is above PB sent to PT below
P1 is below PB sent to PT above

events.comment: Dash Uses Speed modifiers and can get speed upgrade without breaking dash
All character below are Only player 1 atm and need playtesting
